name: Margherita
description: Pizza Margherita is a classic Italian dish that delights with its combination of simple yet exceptional ingredients. On a thin, crispy crust, you'll find juicy San Marzano tomatoes, creamy buffalo mozzarella, and fresh basil leaves, all drizzled with aromatic extra virgin olive oil.

name: Prosciutto
description: Pizza Prosciutto is an exquisite Italian dish that combines the flavors of savory prosciutto, creamy mozzarella, and tangy tomato sauce on a perfectly baked thin crust. Topped with fresh arugula and a hint of parmesan, this pizza offers a delightful balance of textures and tastes, capturing the essence of traditional Italian cuisine.

name: Hamburger
description: The Classic Burger is a timeless favorite that promises pure satisfaction with every bite. A juicy beef patty, grilled to perfection, is sandwiched between two soft, toasted sesame seed buns. Topped with crisp lettuce, juicy tomato slices, tangy pickles, and a dollop of creamy mayonnaise, this burger delivers a perfect balance of flavors and textures. With each bite, you'll experience the comforting familiarity and irresistible taste that have made the classic hamburger an enduring culinary icon.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Sink your teeth into a juicy beef patty, grilled to perfection, and nestled between two golden, toasted sesame seed buns. But the real star of the show? A generous layer of gooey, melted cheese, cascading over the patty in delicious waves of flavor. Topped with crisp lettuce, ripe tomato slices, tangy pickles, and a dollop of creamy mayonnaise, this Cheeseburger is a true classic that never fails to satisfy.

name: Capricciosa
description: Pizza Capricciosa is a classic Italian creation that delights with its harmony of flavors. On a thin, crispy crust, you'll find tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, mushrooms, and black olives, creating an unforgettable taste experience.

name: Baconburger
description: Our Baconburger features a juicy, grilled beef patty topped with crispy bacon, melted cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, and ripe tomato, all nestled in a toasted brioche bun. This savory combination delivers a satisfying and indulgent flavor in every bite.
